bundler.description: Transform the entire asset graph by grouping the assets into the output bundles.

resolvers.description: Resolve a dependency to a file path or virtual module.

transformers.description: Compile individual source files and extract dependencies.

validators.description: Validates individual assets and can throw errors or log warnings with diagnostics to validate the input.

namers.description: Determine the name of an output bundle.

packagers.description: Combine multiple assets together into a single output bundle.

optimizers.description: Minify, optimize, and transform output bundles.

compressors.description: Compress and encode output bundles in multiple formats.

reporters.description: Receive events on build progress and completion.

runtimes.description: Return additional assets to be inserted into a bundle.
